narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This 1st pre-license inspection and exit briefing for an exhibitor license were conducted with the applicant.
The applicant will submit a copy of this report along with the license fee to the Regional Office at:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave
Building B, Mail Stop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. Regulated
activities can not be performed until a USDA license certificate has been issued by the Regional Office.
Additional Inspectors
Cunningham Debbie, Veterinary Medical Officer
